title: Van Aert Back on Bike after Devastating Crash, Evenepoel Confirmed to Be on Track for Tour de France
content:
Sources confirm Evenepoel will train at altitude next month, while the future for Van Aert is less clear with no hints of a return to the Tour this summer.

Read the full article at Van Aert Back on Bike after Devastating Crash, Evenepoel Confirmed to Be on Track for Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
